title: Real Better
description: Built modular, reusable UI components and integrated real-time chat with PubNub, improving engagement and reducing load time by 30%.
Applied performance techniques like lazy loading, useMemo, and useCallback to optimize rendering and memory usage.

title: Jigya
description: Developed infinite scrolling using Intersection Observer and virtual rendering to reduce server calls by 20%.
Delivered bug-free UI enhancements under tight deadlines, ensuring responsive and accessible design.
